name: Don't Do Anything
description:
Overview

The title of the game explains everything you need to know. You are not supposed to, and cannot, do anything in this game. Only wait. I wanted to create the worst game of all time. I believe that I have at least come close.

So if you ever want to say that any particular game (other than this one of course) really sucks, you can say it is worse than Don't Do Anything, which of course, is every game developer's worst nightmare.

Thank you.

Gameplay

There is no gameplay.

Controls

No controls.
